info.title: Art Gallery
info.description: Backend service that provides resources for the beautiful art gallery.

post.description:
Sample request:
            
POST /api/artifacts
{
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Mona Lisa",
    "image": "https://example.com/monalisa.jpg",
    "artist": "Leonardo da Vinci",
    "description": "A portrait painting by Leonardo da Vinci"
}

get.summary: Retrieves a specific artifact by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the artifact to retrieve

put.description:
Sample request:
            
PUT /api/artifacts/1
{
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Updated Mona Lisa",
    "image": "https://example.com/updated-monalisa.jpg",
    "artist": "Leonardo da Vinci",
    "description": "An updated description of Mona Lisa"
}

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the artifact to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the artifact to delete

post.description:
Sample request:
            
POST /api/artstyles
{
    "name": "Impressionism",
    "description": "Art movement characterized by small, thin, yet visible brush strokes, open composition, emphasis on accurate depiction of light in its changing qualities, ordinary subject matter, inclusion of movement as a crucial element of human perception and experience, and unusual visual angles.",
    "image": "https://example.com/impressionism.jpg",
    "creator": "Claude Monet"
}

get.summary: Retrieves a specific art style by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the art style to retrieve

put.description:
Sample request:
            
PUT /api/artstyles/1
{
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Updated Impressionism",
    "description": "An updated description of Impressionism",
    "image": "https://example.com/updated-impressionism.jpg",
    "creator": "Claude Monet"
}

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the art style to update

requestBody.description: Updated information for the art style

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the art style to delete

post.description:
Sample request:
            
POST /api/exhibitions
{
    "name": "Impressionist Masterpieces",
    "description": "A collection of Impressionist artworks from various artists.",
    "place": "Art Gallery",
    "date": "2024-05-01T00:00:00"
}

get.summary: Retrieves a specific exhibition by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the exhibition to retrieve

put.description:
Sample request:
            
PUT /api/exhibitions/1
{
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Updated Impressionist Masterpieces",
    "description": "An updated description of the Impressionist Masterpieces exhibition.",
    "place": "Art Gallery",
    "date": "2024-05-01T00:00:00"
}

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the exhibition to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the exhibition to delete

get.summary: Retrieves a specific user by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to retrieve

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to update.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to delete

patch.summary: Updates the credentials of a user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to update
